languages.text: Restores {uip|Heal|489842740f8d45d4bd5f27c44a89fae1} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Also removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. Removes one {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g}, or, if none exist, attempts to remove one old injury.
languages.original_text: Восстанавливает <u>(12 + Медицина / 3)</u> здоровья. Снимает кровотечение, горение и отравление. Исцеляет 1 свежее ранение. Если таковых нет, происходит попытка исцелить старое ранение.

traits.locale_text: Restores <u>(12 + (Medicae / 3))</u> wounds. Also removes bleeding, burning, and toxin. Removes one fresh injury, or, if none exist, attempts to remove one old Injury.

languages.text: 恢复{uip|Heal|489842740f8d45d4bd5f27c44a89fae1}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。移除{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。此外，还会移除一处{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新伤{/g}，如果目标没有新伤，则会尝试移除一处旧伤。

traits.locale_text: 恢复<u>（12+（{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}/3））</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。移除{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。此外，还会移除一处{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新伤{/g}，如果目标没有新伤，则会尝试移除一处旧伤。

恢复{uip|Heal|489842740f8d45d4bd5f27c44a89fae1}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。移除{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。此外，还会移除一处{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新伤{/g}，如果目标没有新伤，则会尝试移除一处旧伤。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を{uip|Heal|489842740f8d45d4bd5f27c44a89fae1}分回復。さらに{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}状態を無効にする。{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新たな負傷{/g}を1つ回復するか、ない場合は古い負傷を回復。
languages.original_text: Restores {uip|Heal|489842740f8d45d4bd5f27c44a89fae1} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Removes one {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g}, or, if none exist, attempts to remove one old injury.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を<u>(12 + ({g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g} / 3))</u>分回復。さらに{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}状態を無効にする。{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新たな怪我{/g}を1つ回復するか、ない場合は古い負傷を回復。

{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を{uip|Heal|489842740f8d45d4bd5f27c44a89fae1}分回復。さらに{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}状態を無効にする。{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新たな怪我{/g}を1つ回復するか、ない場合は古い負傷を回復。

languages.text: Restaura {uip|Heal|489842740f8d45d4bd5f27c44a89fae1} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. También elimina los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}. Elimina una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión reciente{/g}, o, si no existe alguna, intenta eliminar una lesión duradera.

languages.text: Stellt {uip|Heal|489842740f8d45d4bd5f27c44a89fae1} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} wieder her. Entfernt außerdem {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}. Entfernt eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}frische Verletzung{/g} oder versucht, eine alte Verletzung zu entfernen, wenn es keine frischen gibt.

languages.text: Rétablit {uip|Heal|489842740f8d45d4bd5f27c44a89fae1} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. Supprime également les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}. Supprime une {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion récente{/g} ou, à défaut, tente de supprimer une lésion ancienne.

languages.text: {uip|Heal|489842740f8d45d4bd5f27c44a89fae1} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı tazeler. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} etkilerini kaldırır. Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}taze sakatlığı{/g} tedavi eder. Hiç taze sakatlık yoksa bir eski sakatlığı tedavi etme teşebbüsünde bulunur.
